channel.title: dockerimage on Dvir Segal's blog
channel.description: Recent content in dockerimage on Dvir Segal's blog

item.title: How to run, delete a Docker image
item.description: I covered the basics of creating and building Docker images in part I (if you haven’t read that yet, I would recommend it since this part is based on it). In this part, I’ll explain how to run and delete an image of the container you’ve built. let’s continue Running an image is as simple as docker run -it image_name:tag . Let’s break it down; tag is the one you set when building it; note that if you remove it, then docker assumes you point to the latest.
